short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ultimate Social X-Game Platform - The next generation of GameFi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XSaiyan is a fully on-chain GameFi project set in the DragonBall universe, where users can engage in a unique gaming experience while earning a stable and long-term income. Inspired by the legendary Saiyan warriors, the game combines blockchain and AI technologies on the Arbitrum platform
